title: House of Vampires and Flame
description: The gods are dead.At least, that’s what everyone else seems to think.I, however, know the truth. My father, the God of Ruin, is coming, and with him, everything will fall.Hiding out at this dangerous academy can only protect me for so long, even if I am disguised as a boy to avoid the brutal Bride Trials.One of the cruel princes of the school, Killian, watches me from the shadows.Waiting.Biding his time.I fear that when he catches me, he’ll either be my salvation…Or my downfall.
author: Meg Xuemei X
